title: Question:
author: Thechaup
content: According to a post by https://thechaup.blogspot.com/2023/05/projeto-lovesnoopy-lista-na-bolsa-mexc.html, LOVESCOOBY COIN can beat PEPE COIN, what do you think?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Thechaup on May 19, 2023, 05:50:55 PMAccording to a post by https://thechaup.blogspot.com/2023/05/projeto-lovesnoopy-lista-na-bolsa-mexc.html, LOVESCOOBY COIN can beat PEPE COIN, what do you think?I will rather stop thinking of I am subjected to think in that line of thought and if all thing are equal,  this is another meme coin with just promises to surpass another meme coin that has pumped and dumped at multiple intervals. Not as if Pepe is a perfect memecoin that is worth so much competition from competitors such as the above-mentioned.

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: Thechaup on May 19, 2023, 05:50:55 PMAccording to a post by https://thechaup.blogspot.com/2023/05/projeto-lovesnoopy-lista-na-bolsa-mexc.html, LOVESCOOBY COIN can beat PEPE COIN, what do you think?In such a stream of new memes coins, your lovesnoopy may just get lost. And it is possible to hope that there will be success only with general excitement. Unfortunately, this is not observed on the market now, despite the promotion of the pepe topic. Therefore, it should be shown a feature that will be of interest. So far, only dreams are associated with lovesnoopy.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: And someone will come out and say that their coin, scooby doo will beat the shit out of Snoopy and Pepecoin. Come on, people. There's nowhere that these projects will go and that's just gonna be the same fate as the others. Project over project trying to beat each other's asses. No future for memecoins but it's a place where people can truly make money quickly. But also, you know that if there's a winner then there goes the losers.

comments.author: Iyeman
comments.body: of course every meme coin gonna surpass pepe in every of all these new meme coin supporters' thoughts, it's just funny to me that such words was repeated by the same many other millions meme coins out there.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Thechaup on May 19, 2023, 05:50:55 PMAccording to a post by https://thechaup.blogspot.com/2023/05/projeto-lovesnoopy-lista-na-bolsa-mexc.html, LOVESCOOBY COIN can beat PEPE COIN, what do you think?If it is general posibility then for sure it has a chance to do so. Problem is on the actual; there are many projects being released in this industry but only a few had a pump the moment it is released in this market.  $Pepe and Floki indeed showed good price increase but keep in mind that these are meme tokens. There are no other usage or utility of it which makes it risk of an investment. Its price could skyrocket for an hr and fall in a minute. Actually this is the first time hearing about this meme token but one thing I know is that, when you are late already never enter the market on a coin which is too volatile 'coz you'd possible be other investor's liquidation.
